description: This program provided me with a solid foundation in business administration and management, focusing on professional techniques and the application of sciences to food and equipment, as well as professional technology.

During the master's program, I acquired a deep understanding of the project manager profession and its context, learning to define strategies for project execution. The training emphasized the importance of overseeing all project stages, efficiently coordinating teams, and anticipating potential issues. I also developed skills for optimal distribution of human and material resources, all with the goal of achieving pre-established objectives and ensuring business success in a constantly changing global environment.

description: The Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering trains qualified professionals in the field of Technical Engineering in Computer Science, following the recommendations of the Council of Universities. It provides solid common training in computer science that enables designing, developing, maintaining, and evaluating applications, systems, and computer services using engineering methods, ensuring their reliability, security, and quality.

Specialization in Software Engineering: Focused on the design and development of medium and large-scale applications. It enables the development, maintenance, and evaluation of software services and systems that meet all user requirements, operate reliably and efficiently, are affordable to develop and maintain, and comply with quality standards, applying theories, principles, methods, and practices of Software Engineering.
